dct_title_s: The map of the colony of the Cape of Good Hope
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map, given in "Cape Roods" and "English Miles."
Compiled from plans and original diagrams filed in the Surveyor General's Office ; drawn by M.J. Brook
dct_publisher_sm: Lithographed in the Surveyor General's Office
dct_spatial_sm: Good Hope, Cape of (South Africa : Cape)
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Property rights reside with the repository. Copyright (c) Stanford University. All Rights Reserved.
